personal.name: Ayush Tiwari
personal.title: Product Manager | 0‚Üí1 Product Strategy Expert
personal.bio:
Hey üëã
I'm Ayush, a product-driven professional with 3+ years of experience leading 0‚Üí1 journeys across FinTech (Vance Inc.) and EdTech (Exampeer), plus my own venture BrightBunny. I specialize in GTM strategies, user research loops, and cross-functional execution that drives real impact. Recent product work was recognized by Truecaller's team for strategic depth and user-first thinking. Currently a Product Management Fellow at Product Space, I love solving complex problems with structured thinking and turning insights into meaningful user engagement.

achievements: Product Management Fellow at Product Space (2025)
Appreciated by Truecaller for feature analysis of their Developer SDK
Led 0‚Üí1 products with 30%+ engagement lift and 20% conversion boost

experience.description: Cohort-based PM fellowship focused on 0‚Üí1 execution. Led 2 product sprints (B2C & SaaS) from research to GTM; one solution earned recognition from Truecaller's product team for strategy and execution, driving 30%+ engagement lift. Won capstone project with SonyLIV Enhanced streaming platform solution.

Led 0‚Üí1 B2B sales pipeline by identifying high-conversion segments and informing product-market fit. Drove 20% increase in lead conversion and 15% faster onboarding via GTM experiments and user funnel analysis.
Boosted customer engagement by 30% through landing page optimization and friction-point removal via user journey mapping. Improved dev cycle efficiency by 15% by streamlining cross-team coordination.

Led market and competitor analysis across 10+ players and 3 key user cohorts, improving positioning clarity and boosting demo-to-signup conversion by 25%. Built user feedback loops leading to 3+ UX improvements and 20% boost in task completion.

certifications.name: Atlassian Agile Project Management Professional Certificate
Microsoft Azure AI Essentials Professional Certificate

projects.title: üèÜ SonyLIV Enhanced - Capstone Winner
projects.description: Won capstone competition by solving SonyLIV's critical 7-day user retention problem through innovative mood-based personalization and Netflix-quality user experience. Developed comprehensive streaming platform with AI-powered content discovery, cultural intelligence, and seamless user onboarding flow that projected 40%+ improvement in retention metrics.

images.alt: SonyLIV Enhanced Homepage with mood-based personalization

projects.title: Blinkit Product Strategy - Retention Framework
projects.description: Comprehensive product strategy assignment analyzing Blinkit's competitive positioning in quick commerce and developing actionable retention frameworks. Created data-driven recommendations for customer lifetime value optimization, market expansion strategies, and user engagement mechanisms targeting improved retention metrics.

projects.title: QwikPik - AI Shopping Assistant
projects.description: End-to-end AI-driven shopping assistant reducing purchase decision time by 40% for items under ‚Çπ2,000. Solo PM work from research to live prototype, combining smart search, social proof, and community signals to eliminate decision fatigue on small-ticket purchases.

projects.title: Nykaa Virtual Try-On - AR Makeup Experience
projects.description: Developed an immersive AR virtual try-on experience for Nykaa's lipstick collection, enabling users to test makeup products digitally before purchase. Built as a learning project to explore AR technology integration, computer vision, and beauty-tech user experience patterns.

projects.title: AI Order Assistant - n8n Workflow Automation
projects.description: Built an end-to-end AI workflow automation using n8n.io and Telegram Bot API to demonstrate conversational AI capabilities for e-commerce order management. Created as a learning project to explore workflow orchestration, natural language processing, and chatbot UX design patterns.

projects.title: Truecaller One-Tap Verification Feature Analysis
projects.description: In-depth analysis of Truecaller's One-Tap User Verification SDK aimed at enabling frictionless onboarding and OTP-less checkout for mobile-first users, especially in Tier 2/3 markets. Assessed user pain points, business impact, and outlined monetization and co-marketing strategies to accelerate adoption in the Indian e-commerce and fintech ecosystems.

projects.title: FanCode Playback Continuity & Multi-Device Sync
projects.description: Led the product strategy and UX design for FanCode's playback continuity and multi-device sync feature, aimed at delivering a seamless, Netflix-level sports viewing experience. Focused on persistent, universally accessible 'Continue Watching' across devices and real-time progress sync, targeting improved retention and engagement for 160M+ monthly users, especially in India's Tier 2/3 markets.

internship.workStyle: Strategic thinker with user-first approach and strong cross-functional leadership
